front.title: Enhanced AS Loop Detection for BGP

abstract.t: Misconfiguration and malicious manipulation of BGP AS_Path may lead to route hijack. This document proposes to enhance the BGP Inbound/ Outbound route processing in the case of detecting an AS loop. Two options are proposed for the enhancement, a) a local check at the device; b) data collection/analysis at the remote network controller/ server. Both approaches are beneficial for route hijack detection.
